xlib_symbol.description: Image rollover setup. Can not be called before the window onload event. Pass image IDs starting with 4th argument. The only html requirement is for each IMG tag to have an ID. Assumes this image file naming convention: out img = path + imgEleId + fileExt over img = path + imgEleId + ovrSuffix + fileExt

par.name: sPath
par.note: path to image files (requires trailing slash)

par.name: sFileExt
par.note: see the file name convention (requires dot)

par.name: sImgEleId
par.note: pass all img ele IDs starting with the 4th argument
